name: Wood Elf Sharpshooter

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  range 150/600 ft.  one target. Hit: 10 (1d8+4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) damage. This attack ignores half or three-quarters cover  and long range doesnt impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The strider has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Trackless Travel
special_abilities.desc: The strider can't be tracked by nonmagical means.

special_abilities.name: Trained Accuracy
special_abilities.desc: The striders weapon attacks deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage (included below).

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
